title: Cloud Giant Ancestry
entryLore: As a goliath with Cloud Giant ancestry, you possess the grace and magic of the sky-dwellers. You can step through the air as easily as a cloud moves with the wind, allowing for sudden and supernatural repositioning on the battlefield.

lore.typicalDwelling: Those of cloud giant ancestry often dwell in the high-altitude reaches of ancient mountain citadels, floating sky-palaces, or the grandest districts of major metropolitan cities. Their homes are constructed of durable, often gleaming stone and feature expansive libraries, meditation gardens, and central halls with high, vaulted ceilings that allow for a clear view of the sky. They value aesthetic perfection and structural permanence, their dwellings often doubling as centers of learning or spiritual sanctuary for their communities. Their settlements are monuments to their wisdom and their ancestor's mastery over the highest reaches of the world.
lore.typicalAttire: Cloud giant goliaths favor attire that is both elegant and functional, reflecting their wise and authoritative nature. They wear flowing garments in high-quality fabrics like silk and fine wool in shades of sky blue, charcoal gray, and rich silver. Their clothing is often decorated with intricate patterns of clouds or lightning and sashes that denote their personal history or spiritual lineage. Many wear jewelry that incorporates polished moonstones or clear crystalsâ€”conduits for their natural sky energy. Their appearance is always meticulously curated, conveying a sense of calm, calculated authority.
lore.typicalEnvironment: Isolated mountain peaks, ancient high-altitude plateaus, and the intellectual centers of large cosmopolitan empires are the preferred habitats for those of cloud giant ancestry. They thrive in environments that reward wisdom, long-term planning, and the pursuit of perfection. Many serve as specialized clerics, wise counselors, architects of monumental systems, or resilient guardians of ancient lore. They are comfortable in cold climates and are often the only inhabitants of regions others find too unpredictable for established life.
lore.societyType: Goliath society with cloud giant ancestry is meritocratic and organized around shared wisdom and the pursuit of spiritual and intellectual perfection. They value patience, loyalty, and the belief that the truest measure of a person is their ability to contribute to the enlightenment of their kin. Leadership is held by those who have demonstrated the greatest depth of knowledge or the most successful application of their natural gifts in the service of the community. Their culture is one of collective resilience and the belief that truth is the only defense against the chaos of the world.
lore.typicalAssociation: Those of cloud giant ancestry tend toward lawful good or neutral alignments, driven by a deep-seated sense of duty and a commitment to protecting the moral and social order. They are an honest and empathetic people, often possessing a profound understanding of the suffering and hopes of others. While they are usually peaceful and avoid conflict, they are resolute in their defense of their friends and their way of life. They value stability and the clarity that comes from a life lived in accordance with tradition.
lore.physicalAppearance: Goliaths of cloud giant ancestry possess an imposing and regal appearance, standing 7 to 8 feet tall with powerful, well-defined builds. Their skin range through goliath norms but often features a pale, almost translucent quality and a faint, silver glow. Their eyes are large and expressive, in shades of bright blue, silver, or a deep, liquid white that radiates a quiet energy. They move with a measured, purposeful gait that conveys both immense physical power and a lifetime of calm discipline. Their presence is tranquil and anchors the space around them, a visible manifestation of their internal clarity and unyielding power.

traits.name: Cloud's Jaunt
traits.description: As a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]], you can magically [[teleport|teleport]] up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]], regaining all uses on a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].
